promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive simple bison steel-type with golden horns. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or bison. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aurox, a massive simple bison steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: metal-claw, max-steelspike. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word bison or steel or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, bison-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Aurox dwells peacefully in misty mountain havens, a giant of metal-hard resilience. It wields two powerful moves in its daily quest for survival.
